JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Electrician for construction project køge (min. 2 year contract)
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Electricians, foremen & electrical engineers for Køge!

On behalf of our partner, we are looking for a team, or individuals (Of the same qualification and skills) for a fulltime long term project contract at a major construction site in Køge. This is a great opportunity to work in a ever and fast changing environment, where you are in charge of the success of the daily operations.

NOTE: This job is for candidates who have EU residence, or a work permit for Denmark.

The team we are looking for consist of the following type of candidate profile:

  • Educated Electricians

Job Tasks are as follows:

  • Working with Remote Currents
  • Cable pulling and dressing
  • Assemble Junction Boxes (Mountain of DIN Rails and terminal blocks)
  • Cables & Wires terminations (Circuit, connection, marking, dressing)

A couple of months ahead this will also be part of the job description:

  • Installation and connection of final fix items. Power sockets, light, light switches)

 

What we expect:

  • All electrician profiles are educated electricians, with foreign or Danish papers.
  • Can speak and communicate in English, as a minimum. It is a plus if you speak spanish or italian, but not a requirement.
  • Minimum 2 year of experience after graduating as an electrician.(More extensive requirements if you apply for a role as a supervisor, in comparison to the ordinary electrician position we offer) ( It is a plus if you have experience from Denmark )

The salary is favorable according to the collective agreement.

Startup is as soon as possible.

Work hours are during the day hours (Startup between 07.00-15.00, Fridays 14.30 (Overtime can happen, if you are interested in working extra)

MEGA FLEX A/S will handle all the practical paperwork and guarantee employment under good terms, as well as handle pension and holiday pay. In other words, all you need to focus on is delivering quality work at our partner.

Application:

Interested? If so, hit the “Ansøg/Apply” Button today, and create a profile in our system ASAP. We are having candidate interviews fluidly until the startup date. If you have any questions, feel free to call us at 70 22 09 57 between 09.00-14.00 Monday-Friday.
